reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Educazione e assistenza sanitaria di qualità per i bambini Sahrawi

description.narrative: L’iniziativa mira a garantire a 40.000 bambini Sahrawi, e in particolare a 8 000 bambini in età prescolare, l’accesso ad un sistema educativo e sanitario di qualità, attraverso la fornitura di materiale didattico, corsi di formazione e aggiornamento per gli insegnanti, la fornitura di materiale protettivo per garantire di nuovo lo svolgimento delle lezioni in presenza da una parte, e tramite campagne di vaccinazione dall'altra.

The initiative aims at supporting 40.000 Sahrawi children, with a focus on 8 000 pre-school children, the access to quality education and health services, through the provision of educational material, trainings to teachers, personal protective equipment to allow for in-person classes on one hand; organization of vaccination campaigns on the other.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

sector.narrative: Basic Health Care Services in Emergencies

tag.narrative: Achieve universal health coverage, including financial risk protection, access to quality essential health-care services and access to safe, effective, quality and affordable essential medicines and vaccines for all
Build and upgrade education facilities that are child, disability and gender sensitive and provide safe, non-violent, inclusive and effective learning environments for all
By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all
